title: Tom Clancy's The Division
awards: Excellence in Multiplayer - SXSW Gaming Awards 2017
description: An action RPG set in a post-apocalyptic New York City where players fight to restore order.

title: Tom Clancy's The Division 2
description: A sequel set in Washington D.C., offering enhanced gameplay and cooperative missions.

title: World of Warcraft
awards: Game of the Year - Game Developers Choice Awards 2005
description: A massively multiplayer online role-playing game set in the expansive world of Azeroth.

title: Diablo III
awards: Best PC Game - Spike Video Game Awards 2012
description: A hack-and-slash RPG where players battle the forces of Hell in an epic dark fantasy world.

title: Baldur's Gate 3
awards: Best RPG - The Game Awards 2023
description: An immersive RPG based on Dungeons & Dragons, offering rich storytelling and strategic combat.

title: Dead by Daylight
awards: Best Multiplayer Game - Golden Joystick Awards 2017
description: An asymmetric multiplayer horror game where one player takes the role of a killer and others are survivors.

title: Watch Dogs
description: A hacking-focused action game set in a futuristic Chicago controlled by a central operating system.

title: Bastion
awards: Best Downloadable Game - Spike Video Game Awards 2011
description: An indie action RPG known for its stunning art, rich narrative, and dynamic soundtrack.

title: Euro Truck Simulator 2
awards: Best Simulation Game - Deutscher Computerspielpreis 2013
description: A truck driving simulation game with expansive maps and realistic logistics gameplay.

title: Helldivers 2
description: A cooperative third-person shooter where players defend humanity in intergalactic battles.

title: Divinity: Original Sin 2
awards: Best RPG - BAFTA Games Awards 2018
description: A critically acclaimed RPG with deep storytelling, customizable characters, and tactical combat.

title: Watch Dogs 2
description: A sequel to Watch Dogs, set in San Francisco, featuring a new protagonist and enhanced hacking mechanics.

title: Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse
description: A classic platformer where players control Mickey Mouse on a quest to rescue Minnie from the evil witch Mizrabel.

title: Duke Nukem 3D
awards: Best Action Game - PC Gamer 1996
description: A legendary first-person shooter featuring the iconic action hero Duke Nukem fighting alien invaders.

title: Duke Nukem Forever
description: The long-awaited sequel to Duke Nukem 3D, featuring over-the-top action and Duke's signature humor.

title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
awards: Game of the Year - The Game Awards 2011
description: An open-world RPG set in the vast fantasy world of Skyrim, filled with dragons, dungeons, and epic quests.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
awards: Game of the Year - Golden Joystick Awards 2013
description: An action-packed open-world game featuring a dynamic story with three protagonists in Los Santos.

title: Gris
awards: Best Indie Game - The Game Awards 2019
description: A stunning indie game with beautiful visuals and emotional storytelling centered on grief and loss.

title: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light
description: A cooperative action-adventure game where players solve puzzles and fight enemies in the tombs.

title: Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris
description: A sequel to Guardian of Light, featuring cooperative gameplay and new puzzles in Egyptian temples.

title: Inside
awards: Best Independent Game - The Game Awards 2016
description: A dark, narrative-driven platformer with striking visuals and atmospheric puzzles.

title: Limbo
awards: Excellence in Visual Art - Independent Games Festival 2010
description: A haunting platformer where players guide a boy through a mysterious and dangerous world.

title: Mutant Year Zero: Road to Eden
description: A tactical adventure game combining turn-based combat with exploration in a post-apocalyptic world.

title: Little Nightmares
awards: Best Audio - Develop Awards 2018
description: A dark and whimsical tale where players guide a young girl named Six through a nightmarish world.

title: Oddworld: Abe's Oddysee
awards: Best Console Game - E3 1997
description: A classic platformer where players help Abe escape a meat-processing factory and save his fellow Mudokons.

title: Oddworld: New 'n' Tasty
description: A remake of the classic Abe's Oddysee with modern visuals and reimagined gameplay.

title: Ori and the Blind Forest
awards: Artistic Achievement - BAFTA Games Awards 2016
description: A visually stunning platformer with heartfelt storytelling and challenging gameplay.

title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
awards: Outstanding Achievement in Animation - D.I.C.E. Awards 2021
description: A sequel to Ori and the Blind Forest, with refined gameplay and an emotional story.

title: Papo & Yo
description: A personal and emotional adventure game that explores themes of family and addiction.

title: Rise of the Tomb Raider
awards: Outstanding Achievement in Animation - D.I.C.E. Awards 2016
description: A sequel to the Tomb Raider reboot, featuring Lara Croft's journey to uncover a lost city.

title: Shadow of the Tomb Raider
description: The conclusion to Lara Croft's origin trilogy, set in the jungles of Central America.

title: Superliminal
description: A mind-bending puzzle game where perception is the key to solving challenges.

title: Tomb Raider
description: A reboot of the Tomb Raider series, exploring the origin story of Lara Croft as a survivor.

title: Trine
description: A physics-based platformer where players control three heroes with unique abilities to solve puzzles.

title: Trine 2
description: A sequel to Trine with enhanced visuals, co-op multiplayer, and new puzzles.

title: Trine 3: The Artifacts of Power
description: The third installment in the Trine series, introducing 3D gameplay mechanics.

title: The Walking Dead
awards: Game of the Year - BAFTA Games Awards 2013
description: A narrative-driven game set in the Walking Dead universe, focusing on choices and survival.

title: The Walking Dead: Season 2
description: The sequel to The Walking Dead, continuing the story of Clementine and her struggle to survive.

title: Sonic Generations
description: A celebration of Sonic's legacy, featuring classic and modern Sonic gameplay styles.

title: World War Z
description: A co-op shooter inspired by the movie World War Z, featuring intense zombie hordes.

title: Fallout 4
awards: Game of the Year - D.I.C.E. Awards 2016
description: An open-world RPG set in a post-apocalyptic Boston, filled with exploration and survival mechanics.

title: Portal
awards: Game of the Year - BAFTA Games Awards 2008
description: A mind-bending puzzle game where players use a portal gun to solve challenges.

title: Portal 2
awards: Best Narrative - The Game Awards 2011
description: A sequel to Portal with expanded mechanics, cooperative play, and a deeper story.

title: Spore
description: A life simulation game where players guide a species from a single-cell organism to a space-faring civilization.

title: Giants: Citizen Kabuto
description: A hybrid action-strategy game where players control unique characters in a humorous sci-fi world.
